title: Team Bike Face Off: Comparing the Look 795 Bikes of WorldTour Level Cofidis and Continental Level CIC-U-Nantes
content:
How Does a WorldTour team bike compare with a Continental level bike when they're supplied by the same frame manufacturer?

Read the full article at Team Bike Face Off: Comparing the Look 795 Bikes of WorldTour Level Cofidis and Continental Level CIC-U-Nantes on Velo.
author: Dave Everett
